content: round 2-3 1 single_crochet in each st 12sts round 4 scdec 6x 6sts fo leaving a long tail weave through your open stitches and attach to the tippy top of your hat weave in all those ends and enjoy 12 the santa baby hat pattern is the property of amethyst mermaidesigns please do not distribute the pattern as your own or change anything and say it is your own design you may sell any physical items made from the pattern but please use the original name and credit me as the designer permission is not given for mass production factory of any kind of this design as always thank you so much for purchasing my pattern i love to see all your creations please share your finished work on instagram using the hashtag #amethystmermaidesigns feel free to give me a tag for a feature in my stories as well 13
